articles.title: Ultrafast switching to an insulating-like metastable state by amplitudon excitation of a charge density wave
articles.description: Ultrafast optical excitation of a charge density wave leads to the formation of a metastable gapped state that synchronizes with the underlying correlated phase.
articles.content:

articles.title: Charges laid in alleged anti-Asian incident at Steveston coffee shop
articles.description: Richmond RCMP were called to Rocanini coffee shop in the 3900-block Moncton Street on March 29 after the store manager reported an alleged assault involving racial slurs.
articles.content:
Charges have been laid against two people who allegedly hurled racial slurs at staff at a Steveston coffee shop.
